countryProfile.goalDescription: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

facts.seriesDesc: population living below the extreme poverty line
facts.fact: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line was approximately 0.1% in 2010.

facts.seriesDesc: workers and their families living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day
facts.fact: In 2010, 0.7%  of the country's workers and their families were living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day.

facts.seriesDesc: population living below the national poverty line
facts.fact: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line was 14% in 2010.

countryProfile.goalDescription: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

facts.seriesDesc: population suffering from hunger
facts.fact: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was 4.2% in 2015.

facts.seriesDesc: children under age 5 with stunted growth
facts.fact: In 2012, 7.8% of children under age 5 had stunted growth.

facts.seriesDesc: overweight children under age 5
facts.fact: The share of overweight children under age 5 was 4.7% in 2012.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

facts.seriesDesc: maternal mortality
facts.fact: The maternal mortality ratio was 58 deaths per 100,000 live births in 2015.

facts.seriesDesc: mortality of children under age 5
facts.fact: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 28 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 17 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesDesc: people newly infected with HIV
facts.fact: In 2016, there were about 0 people in every 100,000 uninfected population that became newly infected with HIV.

facts.seriesDesc: risk of dying between ages 30 and 70 from non-communicable diseases
facts.fact: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - fell from 24% in 2000 to 19% in 2016.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

facts.seriesDesc: participation in pre-primary or primary education prior to official entrance age for primary school
facts.fact: In 2004, 61% of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

facts.seriesDesc: women aged 20 to 24 who married before their eighteenth birthday
facts.fact: In 2012, 8.4% of women aged 20 to 24 reported that they were married before their eighteenth birthday.

facts.seriesDesc: seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament
facts.fact: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 0% in 2000 to 15% in 2018.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

facts.seriesDesc: population using a safely managed drinking water service
facts.fact: In 2015, 93% of the population used a "safely managed" drinking water service - an improved source located on premises, available when needed and free from contamination.

facts.seriesDesc: population using a safely managed sanitation service
facts.fact: In 2015, 77% of the population used a "safely managed" sanitation service - a basic facility that safely disposes of human waste.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

facts.seriesDesc: proportion of the population with access to electricity
facts.fact: The proportion of the population with access to electricity was 100% in 2016.

facts.seriesDesc: population relying primarily on clean fuels and technology
facts.fact: In 2016, more than 95% of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

facts.seriesDesc: growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita
facts.fact: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita was -1.2% in 2016.

facts.seriesDesc: unemployment rate
facts.fact: The total unemployment rate declined from 14% in 2000 to 12% in 2014.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

facts.seriesDesc: carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP
facts.fact: The carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP decreased from 0.39 kilograms in 2000 to 0.31 kilograms in 2015.

facts.seriesDesc: investment in research and development (R&D)
facts.fact: In 2016, investment in research and development (R&D) stood at 0.33% of GDP.

facts.seriesDesc: population in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal
facts.fact: In 2016, 99% of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

facts.seriesDesc: urban population living in slums
facts.fact: The proportion of the urban population living in slums declined from 16% in 2005 to 13% in 2014.

facts.seriesDesc: concentration of fine suspended particles
facts.fact: In 2016, the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 32 micrograms per cubic metre. This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

facts.seriesDesc: national and local disaster reduction strategies
facts.fact: As of 2013, Jordan has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

facts.seriesDesc: protected marine environment under national jurisdiction
facts.fact: In 2017, 36% of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

facts.seriesDesc: land area covered by forest
facts.fact: Land area covered by forest was 1.1% in 2015.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

facts.seriesDesc: intentional homicide rate
facts.fact: In 2016, the intentional homicide rate was 1.6 per 100,000 population.

facts.seriesDesc: children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority
facts.fact: In 2012, there were about 99% of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority.

countryProfile.goalDescription: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development

facts.seriesDesc: inflow of personal remittances
facts.fact: In 2016, the inflow of personal remittances was 11% of GDP, down from 22% in 2000.

facts.seriesDesc: Debt service as a proportion of exports
facts.fact: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services increased from 14% in 2000 to 15% in 2016.

facts.seriesDesc: fixed-broadband internet penetration
facts.fact: In 2016, fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 4.8% of the population, up from nearly no coverage in 2001.
